content: I'm looking for some fashion advice. I recently bought a white button-down shirt with ruffles from Zara, and I'm thinking of getting it in other colors too. Do you think it's a good idea to have multiple versions of the same shirt, or would that be too repetitive? By the way, I just got back from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly sale on the previous Monday, and I scored an amazing deal on a designer handbag!
